unnormalised: Breaking News: RBI nvem KYC niyom update keleat, lokanno! 10/11/2024 thavn, tumkam tumchem PAN card (zoxem, ABCDE1234F) tumchea bank a/c kodden link korchem poddttolem tem active dovrunk. Tras disot, punn hem sogllem vostu surakshit dovrunk asa, sori?
normalised: Thoddi khobor: R-B-I-n K-Y-C-chea niyomancho bodol kela, lokanno! Dhaktto November don hazar ani vis chovis savn, tumchea bank account-ak chalu dovrunk tumchea P-A-N card (zoxe ki, A-B-C-D-E ek don tin char F) link korunk zai. Tanklli vata punn te surakshit dovrunk, haka na?

unnormalised: Toxench, tumchea IFSC code update korpachem navem nem disonk dium naka. HDFC Bankachem IFSC, zoxem, HDFC0000123 disonk xakta. Tumchem chukichem na mhonn nischit korun gheiat, nam tor transactions bounce zauunk xaktat! Dhaaktto dhaktti tumchea bankak sampark korat; tumchi mahiti magpi random emailsancher visvas dovrunk naka. Phishing cholta, yaar!
normalised: Ani, tumcho I-F-S-C code update korpacho niyam ugddas dovrat. H-D-F-C bankacho I-F-S-C, zoxe ki, H-D-F-C shunya shunya shunya shunya ek don tin oso dista. Tumcho chukicho zata zalear, vyavhar ulto zaunk xakta! Tumchea bankak sampark korat; tumchea details magpi adgal mailacher visvas dovrunk naka. Phishing khub cholta, yaar!

unnormalised: Surakshitechi ulo apunn kortana, te OTPsancher nazar dovrat! Te konnakuy diunakat, te SBI vo Axis Bank thavn aile mhonn sangtale torui. Tumchem CVV number (tumchea cardache fattile vatten aslelem tem 3 ankddeachem code) mhonnllear gupt utar. Tem tumchea svota James Bond password bhaxen vaporat!
normalised: Surakshitechi khobor kortana, O-T-P-cher nazar dovrat! Konnakuch te vanttunk naka, titleim te S-B-I vo Axis Bankantle asat mhunn sangta zalearui. Tumcho C-V-V number (tumchea cardachea fattile vatten tin ankhi number) to khup gupit. To tumcho James Bond password mhunn monat!

unnormalised: Ani tumi mutual fundsant invest kortat zalear, tumcho Folio Number (1234567890 bhaxen asum yeta) nond korunk ugddas dovrat. Tem tumchem invest yevazonnicher nazar dovrunk mahatvachem asa. Hem sogllem zannttolem tor trasachi vostu dista, punn taka adulting 101 mhonn chintunka, okay?
normalised: Ani tum mutual funds-ant invest kortat zalear, tumcho Folio Number (zoxe ki, ek don tin char panch so sat atth no shunya oso astolo) nond korun dovrunk ugddas dovrat. Tumchea investments-cher nazar dovrunk to khup mhotvacho. Hem sogllem thoddem avghadd dista punn tem adulting ek shunya ek mhunn monat, bara?

unnormalised: Xevttak, NSDL ani CDSL demat a/c asloleamno, tumcho registered mobile no. update kela mhonn takas korat. Hem sadhem dista, punn tumchea soglleam transactionsak alerts mellovnk mahatvachem asa. Surakshit ravat, mahitgar ravat, ani khuxi zal'lim banking korat, lokanno!
normalised: Xevttim, N-S-D-L ani C-D-S-L demat account dharakanni, tumcho nond kel'lo mobile number update kela mhunn tanka nischit korat. Tem sadhem dista punn tumchea sogllea vyavharancho alert mellovpak to khup mhotvacho. Surakshit ravat, mahitgar ravat, ani khuxal banking korat, lokanno!
